abstract: InterContinental Hotels has started renovating some of its Holiday Inns and is honoring the chain’s founder, C. Kemmons Wilson.
snippet: InterContinental Hotels has started renovating some of its Holiday Inns and is honoring the chain’s founder, C. Kemmons Wilson.
lead_paragraph: In 1996, the furniture from the world’s first Holiday Inn, in Memphis, became part of a museum collection. But this year, the family of C. Kemmons Wilson, who founded the Holiday Inn chain in 1952, borrowed it back.

headline.main: Holiday Inn Reaches Back to Its Memphis Roots
headline.print_headline: Holiday Inn Reaches Back to Its Memphis Roots
